name: teseo
description: find its way out of the labyrinth

scripts.diff-lint: LIST=`git diff-index --name-only --diff-filter=d HEAD | grep .*\.js | grep -v json`; if [ "$LIST" ]; then eslint --fix $LIST; fi
scripts.install: mkdir output && npm i && npm run test
scripts.build: mkdir -p output && npm run lint && npm run test

author: Daniel Spiers
